description: This file defines the ChatRepository class, which provides methods for accessing and managing chat messages via Firebase APIs, including subscribing to message streams, loading message history, and sending messages.

classes.name: ChatRepository
classes.description: A class that provides an abstraction for chat message data operations, utilizing Firebase APIs to fetch, stream, and send messages.

methods.name: subscribeConversation
methods.description: Returns a stream of chat messages from a specific conversation, enabling real-time updates.

methods.name: loadHistory
methods.description: Fetches the historical chat messages for a specific conversation.

methods.name: send
methods.description: Sends a chat message via the Firebase REST API.
